docs.snippet: The only incident in the trading in foreign exchanges last week to disturb the even tenor of the markets of the last four months was the abrupt decline in the Chinese currencies as a direct result of the withdrawal of support by the control fund.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 19 -- Uruguayan authorities refused to permit the landing here today of fifteen Jewish passengers who arrived on the Japanese steamer Montevideo Maru after several months of wandering, in which they have almost encircled the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 19 -- Uruguayan authorities refused to permit the landing here today of fifteen Jewish passengers who arrived on the Japanese steamer Montevideo Maru after several months of wandering, in which they have almost encircled the globe.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 20 -- A British naval plane that alighted on Maldonado Bay last Tuesday night when it ran out of fuel while keeping watch over the French steamship Mendoza, anchored at Punta del Este, will be released to the British...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 20 -- A British naval plane that alighted on Maldonado Bay last Tuesday night when it ran out of fuel while keeping watch over the French steamship Mendoza, anchored at Punta del Este, will be released to the British Legation tomorrow.

docs.lead_paragraph: Commercial credit and collection conditions in Latin-American markets and in the British, French and Netherlands possessions in the West Indies showed a decided improvement in the last half of 1940, according to the results of a survey released yesterday by the foreign credit interchange bureau of the National Association of Credit Men.
